history.proof: intros n m p H. qsimpl time: 1 use: N,lt_le_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: N,lt_le_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: N,lt_le_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: N,lt_le_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: N,lt_le_trans. strivial use: N.add_lt_mono_l unfold: N.lt.

exceptions.tactic: apply N.lt_le_trans with (n := p + n) (m := p + m) (p := m).
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H : n < m Unable to unify "p + n < m" with "p + n < p + m".
Unable to find an instance for the variables n, m.
In environment H : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (n ?= m) = Lt Unable to unify "(S ?M2540 <= ?M2542)%nat" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
Found no subterm matching "?M2796 + ?M2797 + ?M2798" in the current goal.

In environment H : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (n ?= m) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M3052 < ?M3053 -> ?M3052 + ?M3054 < ?M3053 + ?M3054) /\\ (?M3052 + ?M3054 < ?M3053 + ?M3054 -> ?M3052 < ?M3053)" with "(p + n ?= p + m) = Lt".
The reference H was not found in the current environment.
In environment H0 : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m, p : N H2 : (n ?= m) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M3326 ?= ?M3326) = Gt" with "p = 0".

In environment H1 : forall n : nat, (n <= n)%nat H : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat n, m : N H2 : (n ?= m) = Lt Unable to unify "(?M3506 ?= ?M3506) = Gt -> False" with "False".

original: intros n m p H. apply N.lt_le_trans with (n := p + n) (m := p + m) (p := m). - apply N.lt_le_add_lt. + apply H. + rewrite N.add_shuffle0. apply N.add_lt_mono_r. * apply N.lt_lt_add_r. apply H. * apply N.le_refl. - apply N.le_refl.
